title: nf-core/mihcro pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

tiffs.errorMessage: TIFF path (either file or directory) must be provided, and if it contains spaces, it should be quoted like so: 'example/path to/tiffs'

format.errorMessage: Format must be one of: tiles, stitched, fused
format.help_text: Input format: 'tiles' for tiled TIFFs (default), 'stitched' for .ome.tiff files, 'fused' for HALO-fused .tiff files
